radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is normal in shape and contour with normal echogenicity; no focal hepatic lesions; main portal vein is patent. The gallbladder appears distended with hyperechoic material consistent with sludge and some shadowing echogenic foci likely small stones; gallbladder wall minimally thickened with pericholecystic fluid. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary duct dilation; common bile duct measures 5 mm.
